content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving home from lexington, ky to somerset, ky via kentucky highway 27 on january 13th,2011 at 12am.

i saw a red light to the east and dismissed it as a helicopter. 

i work in aviation and know this is a typical route for med evac choppers heading northward to uk. 

we continued southward and noticed the light getting closer, but, still payed no mind. 

a while later a truck caught up to us and followed closely for a few minutes. 

after a while it passed us in a big hurry.

this caused us to look around to see what was going on and a business jet  sized aircraft (100ft x 100ft x 100ft)was heading towards us very slowly moving westward roughly 50ft above the ground. 

it was black and had a pyramid shape, was not square, but triangular on the bottom.

i'm not sure if it was fear or not but we slowed down to nearly a stop so it would pass ahead. the craft than averted it's course and stayed true towards our vehicle.

once the ship was directly above us we could see a glowing red / yellow orb in the center as well as slightly smaller red lights on the 3 pointed edges.  it also had small blue and white rectangular lights that flashed in a pattern once it was directly over us (almost like it was scanning our vehicle)

my wife attempted to video the ordeal with her phone, but, was unable to get it to work.

luckily we were in our 92 honda accord which has an engine that is not as computer based as a newer vehicle. i firmly believe it would have stalled the car.

the ship never made a sound while hovering directly above us (approx. 15 mins) 

it then slowly moved to the southwest and took about 15 mins to appear to be the size it was when we first saw it. it than right angled northward towards the stars.

the event lasted nearly 30 minutes and spanned from nicholasville to lancaster.

we phoned some friends who traveled ahead in another vehicle to see if they saw it as well.  

they did not see it since there was an hour of time in between our departures.  

we didn't get home until around 3am which was an hour later than we should have, even with our slowed trip. we are still unsure about that.
content.summary: Triangular / pyramid ufo passed over and " scanned " vehicle.  event lasted 30 min.

content.detailedDescription:
Observed dark circular object with five other winesses. time was approximately 2305 on june 3, 2012. clear night with moon visible and a few high cirrus clouds. we had just left our next door neighbors house and were on our front sidewalk. my friend first noticed the object and drew our attention to it.
object was traveling slowly from nnw to sse at 3000-4000 feet altitude.
object appeared solid with unusual lighting configuration.
had one large steady yellow/orange light to the left of centerline about halfway between front and rear of object. had three smaller lights (all in a row and same color as the large light) to the right of centerline oriented left to right. also had 7 small lights (same color as others) evenly spaced on the forward edge of the object. object made no discernible noise as it passed over us. just before traveling out of sight the lights flickered two or three times before going out completely. once the lights went out we lost sight of the object. total observation time was approximately 3-5 minutes.
object shape did not appear to be a perfect circle but seemed to be slightly flattened on the leading and trailing edges.
both my friend and i have a combined 50 years of aviation experience. we were both flight engineers in the military, and i currently work as an instructor for an airline.
neither one of us knew quite what to make of the object. at first i thougt it might have been a gag (someone rigging up some lights on a light aircraft)but the object appeared to be traveling too slowly for a light aircraft, and the absence of any engine/prop/rotor noise was inconsistent with it being a helicopter or autogyro either.
we didn't feel afraid or otherwise concerned about the object. all of us were primarily occupied with just trying to figure out what it could be.
after it disappeared we talked about it for a few minutes and then went to bed.
content.summary: Dark circular object with multiple lights (same color) and no noise.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i  were sitting outside on a the deck of our lake cottage at coldwater lake. i looked up and saw what appeared to be a star but it was moving very fast across the sky. it moved across the sky dipped down, slowed down then went up and eventually faded away.
content.summary: Look like a star flew across the sky turned down then up then faded away as if it took off out of the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: I was driving and turned onto wade green rd from hwy 92. my immediate location was considered acworth ga but the object was over the vicinity of kennesaw ga (my guesstimate would be near downtown kennesaw). it was a straight shot, trees on either side. i noticed what looked like venus...Except it was no doubt much brighter, bigger, and higher in the sky than venus ever is. plus it was around 10-10:30 at night. distance is questionable - it could have been a mile away or 10 miles away, i do not know. i watched it while i drove straight down that road and after about 2 minutes it just flickered out in the blink of an eye. i was driving, so wasn't able to tell whether or not it was moving, but appeared to be in one spot in the sky. clear skies in metro area with streetlights lining the road so it was the only 'star' visible. it appeared to be miles away so my eyes could only perceive an orb-like ball of light. it was the same color as the deep-yellowish-orange street lamps (but ever so slightly more yellow), but definitely not a streetlamp because it was high in the sky. it just disappeared. intense, bright orb-like light flickered out and vanished. there was no blinking lights that i could tell (like any earth-bound aircraft). the fact that it simply disappeared is what keeps me wondering about it.
content.summary: Intense-glowing orb/object bigger/brighter than venus. flickered out/disappeared. clear skies

content.detailedDescription:
It was summertime and i was working at the boyscout camp. i knew there was a meteor shower occurring that night and over the next few nights. after dark, i think it was around 10:30, a group of us decided to go out to the amphitheater right next to the lake for best, unobstructed viewing on the scout reservation to watch for meteors. it was a warm, clear, cloudless night. we saw a few meteors but then, out of the south, southwest, a small whitish-green object came from the horizon over the tree tops on a straight path toward the north, northeast. as a scout, i had seen plenty of night sky objects in my years of camping and at first thought it was a satellite; it was about the same size and brightness and traveled along an approximate north-south, straight line at a constant speed just like every other satellite i have seen. however, things changed as soon as it got directly overhead, nearly at the center of the sky from our viewpoint. it came to a dead stop. of course, at this point, it got our attention. there were no flashing lights as one might expect with conventional aircraft, no sounds, nothing. the object seemed to be at a very high altitude so we weren���t scared but just kept watching in amazement. it remained at the center of the sky for a moment or so and then began to vibrate wildly, back and forth, side to side, in circles, all while remaining in the relative center of the sky. these movements lasted no more than a few minutes. then, almost instantaneously, the object zipped to the north-northeastern corner of the sky, swelled to approximately 5 times its size (to my eye, the object was first the size of a large star and swelled to approximately the size of a tic-tac), turned bright red, and shot off to the northwest faster than anything i have ever seen. these movements were so fast, they were almost unbelievable. as i have told this story over the years a few times, i have attempted to convey the speed at which this object moved. the only way i can come close to describing it is to use a laser pointer to replicate the objects movements on the ceiling of the room i am in while telling the story. 
after the object shot off, we all discussed what we had seen but mostly our comments were, ���did you guys just see that too?��� and ���what the hell was that?��� we all agreed that it was not a meteor that we had seen performing such radical flight. being young teenagers, it didn���t seem to bother us that we had no idea what we had just seen in the sky and we decided to stay and continue to watch the meteor shower. about 5-10 minutes later, we noticed another object similar to the first unknown object appear on the horizon to the southeast. it was moving to the northwest at the same, constant rate of speed as the first. we thought, this time, this object must be a satellite. a moment later, yet another object appeared on the horizon opposite and began to move to the southeast and it appeared the two objects were on an intercept course. as the two objects approached each other, i felt nervous; it began to dawn on me that if these were vehicles not of earth, there might be a chance they know we are watching them. i don���t know if the others had the same feelings ��� we were pretty silent at this point, i guess in near disbelief of what we were observing. as the two objects nearly met, they stopped at the center of the sky in almost the same spot that the first object had stopped. then as if as a means of communication ��� or at least that is what i have always thought was going on ��� they began to move around each other. it was like a dance. one would be still, no movement at all, and the other would go around it in circles so fast it was unbelievable. as i stated previously, the only way to accurately communicate what i observed is to use two laser pointers, hold one on the ceiling still and use the other to circle it as quickly as possible; however, i cannot reproduce the speed with which these two objects moved. sometimes they just wiggled back and forth and other times they moved in patterns. sometimes the two objects both moved at the same time. at one point, a smaller object, circular and a similar whitish-green, appeared to come out of one of the two objects, ���dance��� around like the other two larger objects, and then a moment later it appeared to be absorbed back into the object from it was summertime and i was working at the boyscout camp. i knew there was a meteor shower occurring that night and over the next few nights. after dark, i think it was around 9:30, a group of us decided to go out to the amphitheater right next to the lake for best, unobstructed viewing on the scout reservation to watch for meteors. it was a warm, clear, cloudless night. we saw a few meteors but then, out of the south, southwest, a small whitish-green object came from the horizon over the tree tops on a straight path toward the north, northeast. as a scout, i had seen plenty of night sky objects in my years of camping and at first thought it was a satellite; it was about the same size and brightness and traveled along an approximate north-south, straight line at a constant speed just like every other satellite i have seen. however, things changed as soon as it got directly overhead, nearly at the center of the sky from our viewpoint. it came to a dead stop. of course, at this point, it got our attention. there were no flashing lights as one might expect with conventional aircraft, no sounds, nothing. the object seemed to be at a very high altitude so we weren���t scared but just kept watching in amazement. it remained at the center of the sky for a moment or so and then began to vibrate wildly, back and forth, side to side, in circles, all while remaining in the relative center of the sky. these movements lasted no more than a few minutes. then, almost instantaneously, the object zipped to the north-northeastern corner of the sky, swelled to approximately 5 times its size (to my eye, the object was first the size of a large star and swelled to approximately the size of a tic-tac), turned bright red, and shot off to the northwest faster than anything i have ever seen. these movements were so fast, they were almost unbelievable. as i have told this story over the years a few times, i have attempted to convey the speed at which this object moved. the only way i can come close to describing it is to use a laser pointer to replicate the objects movements on the ceiling of the room i am in while telling the story. 
after the object shot off, we all discussed what we had seen but mostly our comments were, ���did you guys just see that too?��� and ���what the hell was that?��� we all agreed that it was not a meteor that we had seen performing such radical flight. being young teenagers, it didn���t seem to bother us that we had no idea what we had just seen in the sky and we decided to stay and continue to watch the meteor shower. about 5-10 minutes later, we noticed another object similar to the first unknown object appear on the horizon to the southeast. it was moving to the northwest at the same, constant rate of speed as the first. we thought, this time, this object must be a satellite. a moment later, yet another object appeared on the horizon opposite and began to move to the southeast and it appeared the two objects were on an intercept course. as the two objects approached each other, i felt nervous; it began to dawn on me that if these were vehicles not of earth, there might be a chance they know we are watching them. i don���t know if the others had the same feelings ��� we were pretty silent at this point, i guess in near disbelief of what we were observing. as the two objects nearly met, they stopped at the center of the sky in almost the same spot that the first object had stopped. then as if as a means of communication ��� or at least that is what i have always thought was going on ��� they began to move around each other. it was like a dance. one would be still, no movement at all, and the other would go around it in circles so fast it was unbelievable. as i stated previously, the only way to accurately communicate what i observed is to use two laser pointers, hold one on the ceiling still and use the other to circle it as quickly as possible; however, i cannot reproduce the speed with which these two objects moved. sometimes they just wiggled back and forth and other times they moved in patterns. sometimes the two objects both moved at the same time. sometimes the brightness of one or both of the objects increased or decreased, sometimes they flashed. the lights were not spot lights; there were no beams of light, just glowing. at one point, a smaller object, circular and a similar whitish-green, appeared to come out of one of the two objects, ���dance��� around like the other two larger objects, and then a moment later it appeared to be absorbed back into the object from which it appeared.  this went on for about ten minutes. when it ended, it was as abrupt at the first object shooting off; the two objects became still and then zipped off in the directions from which they came. as soon as they were out of site, all of us agreed we had seen enough and we got up to go tell someone what we had seen. of course, all of the older folks we told said it was ���heat lightning���, anything other than believing what we had witnessed. 
i am an educated person. i have flown in passenger aircraft, commercial flights and smaller, private cessna-type aircraft. i work next to a very busy small aircraft airport which launches and refuels local news station helicopters all day long. i have been around military aircraft including, helicopters, fighter jets, and osprey. what i saw in the night sky in ky that night cannot possibly have been conventional human aircraft ��� if human at all. no human-made aircraft that i am aware of can move at the speeds, change directions at those high speeds, change size, emit a light (not navigation or landing lights), or accelerate from absolute still to the horizon literally faster than a snap.
which it appeared.  this went on for about ten minutes. when it ended, it was as abrupt at the first object shooting off; the two objects became still and then zipped off in the directions from which they came. as soon as they were out of site, all of us agreed we had seen enough and we got up to go tell someone what we had seen. of course, all of the older folks we told said it was ���heat lightning���, anything other than believing what we had witnessed. 
i am an educated person. i have flown in passenger aircraft, commercial flights and smaller, private cessna-type aircraft. i work next to a very busy small aircraft airport which launches and refuels local news station helicopters all day long. i have been around military aircraft including, helicopters, fighter jets, and osprey. what i saw in the night sky in ky that night cannot possibly have been conventional human aircraft ��� if human at all. no human-made aircraft that i am aware of can move at the speeds, change directions at those high speeds, change size, emit a light (not navigation or landing lights), or accelerate from absolute still to the horizon literally faster than a snap.
content.summary: Amazing. nothing on earth can move like what we observed.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out skywatching with a close friend of ours when i suddenly noticed a strange strobing lighted object coming into our field of view. we watched it for about 5 minutes before it went out of view.  at first we all thought it was strange. it was coming from the de leon area and heading towards stephenville. we watched in amazement for a couple of minutes, then i decided to grab my binoculars and look at it.  that is when we realized it was a triangle shaped craft. you could clearly see it through the binoculars.  the strobe it had was different than anything i've seen.  the lights appeared to be white in color with the occasional hint of red.  this was our friends first legit sighting. the lights appeared to be fluttering or vibrating maybe. we left our original spot and drove across the field to get a better view.  we all watched as it slowly disappeared. it was definately not something you would see in the sky.
content.summary: Lighted triangle object with strange strobing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
i was standing next to my friend who was standing in a 10 ft clearing in woods when she was personally buzzed by this unseen object.  


then the sat night before easter, we decided to sit in my truck and watch at night.  we 1st saw orbs in the woods and then a white light flew in and stopped at the front corner of the woods no higher than the trees and hovered there silently for over 45 mins. 


the object was across the cornfield from us which is no more than a short block.  the object would get brighter sometimes, it would change from a pacman shape (or bell shape) to round, sometimes fade out to a cigarette shape and disappear and then come back on bright as ever.  we forgot our binoculars but we could see that sometimes there was a red light at the bottom and sometimes the object was a white circle with a red ring around it.  it made no noise whatsoever and hovered there until it traveled back over a duck pond area and then over a marsh area when we lost sight of it.  altogether we saw it that sat for an hour probably.


the weirder thing though, is that we go back every sat nite and between 8 & 10pm, the object shows up but it has been farther away over the duck pond and marsh areas.  on these other occasions, we have seen in our binoculars that the object has red lights sometimes, sometimes it is circled in red, sometimes we see green lights, or blue lights, sometimes a 2 part object connected, one time hazy search lights or something that shines to the area below it and then in front of it and then above it.  but it always hovers in an area and then moves and hovers over another area for a long time.  last night it seemed farther away and we got bored watching it for over a half hour so we thought maybe we could find it and get closer.  everytime we do that though, we either can't find it at all or like last night we lost sight of it on the winding country roads or it moved off.  we watched that object last night for over 2 hours.


the reason we are contacting you is we would like someone else to take a look at this object who has knowledge of ufo's and tell us what you think and also because maybe you can give us some clues on how to track it better to get a closer look.  the first time we saw it, we were too scared to even move!  now, we want to get a better look.
content.summary: Unusual lights seen in an area where we have been searching for a bigfoot

content.detailedDescription:
June 9th, 2012, 9:55pm at 13th and overton, pdx 97209, i was waking home with my girlfriend from safeway grocery store. i looked up and saw a bright white light i at first thought was a planet because it was so large, then i noticed it was moving. it traveled somewhat slowly in comparison to and relatively at the same height as small/medium size planes appear to travel. its flight seemed too perfectly steady to me, but the key factors by which i deemed it ufo were that the white light of it, as bright as the forward facing headlight of a 747 remained brilliantly white even as it flew directly overhead and off into the distance. also there was not one blinking light, nor any red or blue lights to indicate it as a standard aircraft as i know them. it did have a dim aura, seemingly yellow/brownish, faint, i couldn't tell if it was or not, though probably was haziness in the sky,(no actual clouds). there was no sound, propeller or jet, emanating from it. i realized this when i soon saw and heard a small propeller plane circling the area, (mile radius?)this plane had a blinking white light, dim and weak in comparison, one red and one blue light. i could also see some dim light reflecting off the bottom of its wings. the distinguishing characteristics between the two were dissimilar. 
i recognize the likeness of it to regular craft, but this was not normal.
content.summary: Unwavering bright white light w/o blinking or red&blue lights, no sound, traveling n/ne, straight line, seemed just a bit higher, but biggeer, than small plane circling area, no sound like the other plane came with

content.detailedDescription:
I went on the mufon-nc website saturday afternoon and read about recent sightings in nc.  being familiar with belmont, i was intrigued by a recent report.  so, i invited a friend, nancy queen, to go to a boat docking area saturday night and stake out the area.  this location is about a mile south of the allen stream plant in belmont, nc. 
   
we arrived at the site about 7:30pm and took a few pictures.  when it started getting dark, i mounted my camera on a tripod and waited to see if anything got our attention.  as we stood on the cement slab attached to the boat docking area, i caught sight of a flying object coming towards us.  the object was glowing orange.  i called out to nancy as two more aircraft came over the treeline orange lights aglow.  the first aircraft stayed in front of the other two aircraft which were flying side by side quite close to each other.  as my camera was pointing in their direction, i started snapping pictures.  although the aircraft seemed to be moving much slower than the jets we had seen earlier in the evening, i had no idea it took two minutes for them to pass over our heads, heading south to north toward the allen stream plant.  (please note that the first picture was taken at 9:25pm and the last picture at 9:27pm.)  the reason i am accurate about the directions is because i took my compass with me and had already checked to ascertain north and south.  my camera was attached to a tripod and there was no movement on my part.
 
there was no noise as the aircraft flew by us.  amazingly, there were several boats being placed on their trailers during this time frame but nobody but nancy and i noticed the aircraft.  and, we were making quite a todo about them.  
 
what struck me about the three flying objects was the single orange glow each projected.  i couldn't make out any features on the aircraft as the light was blinding.  nancy managed to get some pictures with her camera as well as me.
content.summary: Glowing orange object appeared above the treeline.  within seconds, two other objects came into view flying side by side.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were driving home at about 11 pm.  i looked up at what i thought was a plane but realized it was making no sounds and was moving extremely slow and had no blinking lights indicative to aircraft.  it started making spiratic direction changes.  then slowly went off into the horizon and disapeared.  over the last six months i have witnessed this ufo several times with 4 different witnesses all were clueless to what it was.  have seen this object hover at low altitudes and seemingly disapear into thin air on two of these sightings i have attempted to film the object with my hd camera on my phone both times my camera app had green lines running verticly down the screen and i could not film.  this issue has only happened when the object is near.  all of my sighting have been between 9 pm and 12 pm generally on saturday and sundays.  i have five other witnesses who would also say they have seen the object including a very close frightening encounter where the object hovered over me and a friend at low altitude.  i never felt threatened by the object and have since started scanning the skies for it rather frequently and have seen it on numerous occasions.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Bright blueish light hovering and changing direction rapidly.  disapeared suddenly.

content.detailedDescription: i was sunbathing sitting about 45 degree angle and noticed a reflective object at what appeared to be an extreme elevation. the object traveled from south west to northeast. on it's path, the object would stop,make a small circle path and then continue on the original path.I first thought the object was a satelite due to it's apperant altitude. i was interested. the object disappared and about 2 minutes later 4 fighter jets flew from the south by norad northbound. thats what made the whole thing seem strange.
content.summary: Ufo would fly straight path, stop, make small circle, proceed on path. east to west.

content.detailedDescription: my wife, myself, our 8 year old daughter, my visiting brother, and his wife, all were witnesses to the following event. we were sitting on the back patio chatting about 11:00 . my brothers wife first noticed circular, brightly glowing orange lights appearing over a stand of trees at our left (se?). she pointed them out to us and we watched them move across the horizon almost overhead (toward ne?). they flew in tight formation, but there seemed to be some slight fluctuation in their closeness to each other. they were glowing bright orange, and were about the size of an aspirin in the sky. amazingly, they were followed by another couple of single lights flying in the same path, and then another group of three. then followed another 2 or 3. some of the objects dimmed their lights when they got close to overhead, but could still be observed flying across the sky. they were absolutely silent, and seemed to be flying at a speed somewhat faster than an airplane. our house is under an airport flight path, and we often see airplanes cross over. when we see planes, though, they're closer to the ground, either gaining or losing altitude, make noise, and they're landing lights blink in a regular pattern. their flight path is also different directionally. i am 56 years old, and have never seen lights like this in the sky. my brother observed what he though were a couple of other objects moving extremely fast across our field of vision, but much dimmer. he has a short video of part of the event captured on his cellphone. we talked about this experience for some time afterward. amazing!
content.summary: Series of glowing orange circular shapes flying in triangular formation and singly.

content.detailedDescription:
8-9 foot tall greenish-gray figure walking into forest line next to road.

my cousin and i had just finished eating dinner and playing a round of golf. we were driving on a two lane road that leads back into the east side of our city. as we turned right at a corner that leads back into the main road, we drove another 100 feet until : on the right side of the road i saw a 8-9 foot figure that was walking back into the edge of the forest located under a street light. i immediately hit the brakes, unsure of what i saw, my cousin who was in the passenger seat looked as shocked as i was. i yelled ���i think that was an alien��� the car came to a stop and my cousin yelled ���go go go !��� i sped up and my eyes were tearing up as i couldn���t believe what i had just seen, my cousin said ���i thought i was seeing things!��� i replied with ���no i saw it too!��� we drove to our apartment which is near by still shocked and startled i immediately called some friends. they came and picked me up and drove us back to the spot where i saw the figure. i explained what had happened to them, and when we drove back to the location some brush had looked to be parted where something had walked through it. i made the call to the nuforc hotline next where a gentleman told me to make this report and call local authorities.

the figure stood 8-9 feet tall , had a tall rounded crown shape head, the head was as big as a human abdomen, the figure was somewhat muscular looking, it had big eyes, but not stereotypical alien-like , long legs and it did not seemed startled whatsoever.
content.summary: 8-9 foot tall alien sighted next to road

content.detailedDescription:
While at home watching channel 5 news this morning at 7;57 am june 10, 2012, i noticed what appeared to be an object dark in color ascent from the ground at a high rate of speed and shoots up into the air. this image was captured above the male newscaster as he was talking to his counterpart, a female newscaster dressed in red. the back ground on this telecast was of numerous buildings and some type of dome not sure if some where close to an airport. as i continued to watch the news, i did not observed any other object or plane in the area. i was somewhat startled as to how this object shot up into the sky from the ground. i rewound the image a couple of times in order to identify it but i could not, due to the speed. if you are able to retrieve the telecast, you might be able to identified this object better than me. what caught my attention was the fashion in which this abject ascended from the ground and into the sky. 

i would be interested in knowing your opinion in this matter. thank you.
content.summary: Dark object

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north on ill route 48 as i was going under an overpass, i looked up and noticed an orange light. thought it was just a street light but soon realized it was much higher than the trees. as i kept driving i looked to my left to see if the people on the motorcycles had noticed but they didn't look up. i pulled over onto w marietta to step out at take a video. then i noticed a second object that appeared to be a distance apart but moving in the same hoovering pulsating motion as the first. at this point both objects started to move to the northwest over macarthur high school. as soon a i start to video my phone shuts off and the objects had moved out of sight! leaving me with a short video. at first i do everything i can  to determin what i saw. call my wife and told her what i saw. if it was a plane since when do they allow two to fly so close to each other and what kind hoovers and pulsates?!!
content.summary: 2 orange rounded squares pulsated, hooverd and took directional path northwest over macarthur high school.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night about 10:15 i was letting the dogs in from outside when i noticed two bright amber lights going south to north.  i was watching them and they didn't blink and were moving quite fast. all of a sudden one faded out as if shutting a light off. i came in and went out on the deck in front and there came another one. i yelled for the wife to come see the ufo and she came out and saw it too. soon yet another one came and they all seemed to follow the same flight pattern and they made no noise whatsoever. i went in and grabbed the camera and went out to the back yard and waited. nothing came for quite awhile.  she went back in because the mosquitoes were bad so i went to the front deck. having my camera set on video mode and waiting.  then two more came and i headed to the back yard away from the big tree in front. when i got to the back the second light was gone, but i captured the one on video. it was a very bright amber light, not blinking. when i played back the video it shows the light, but it's flashing green and blue as well.
the ufo was flying in a straight path but the video shows it jumping around.  that is me trying to keep it in the viewfinder.
content.summary: Very bright amber globe

content.detailedDescription:
Yup. this one's a weird one. 

i was lying in bed, my b/f was moaning... he for some reason, he moaned "no" more than once, sounded like he was having a bad dream. i put my hand out, and felt in the palm of my hand a somewhat cube shaped object with a rounded corner. it was plexiglass/ acrylic feeling.  felt about an inch/ inch and a half square. nothing else was felt, just smooth plastic. room temp, no other sensations. got out "what the hell is *this*?" and then "fell asleep" immediately. not my usual way of dealing with stuff. by all rights, i should have been able to have object in hand, tap my b/f on whatever side i could find and ask him "what is this thing, and where did you find it?" and about the bad dreams. 

we searched the bed this morning...Around the bed, under it, pillows, blankets. we do not even own anything that fits the description of the object (tho as an aside, we found one of the spice bottles- ground mustard- in a pair of leather riding shoes.... in an obvious statement, all spices reside n the cabinets. how it got there, in the bedroom....)


my b/f was seeing small red dots like laser pointer dots friday. i am not sure if this is in connection with last night's mystery cube or not- we have both seen ufos, aliens, etc.
content.summary: Found alien object in bed.....

content.detailedDescription: I just walked out the door and looked up and noticed something really bright and close. at first i thought i was looking at a satellite, then i noticed how bright and close it was. i watched it fly pass, not a super fast rate, but much faster then a plane. plus it was still light out which showed the outline of the sphere for about 4 minutes, then ascended/vanished. luckily a few minutes after i noticed a plane fly pass, which definitely allowed a comparison to the speed of the sphere to the jet's slower pace.
content.summary: Bright reflective sphere over olympia

content.detailedDescription:
Our shift change at work starts at 4:30 am, 5 of us are standing outside, around 4:45 am, i spotted an unusual light in upper western sky and it made its way to the south eastern horizon.  a solid white light, bright, no tail, no blinking lights, 10 times faster than any jet i have ever seen, yet slower than any meteor ( and no tail). as it was coming towards us and was going away from us, the light nvr changed brightness or waivered. ( not a headlight on a plane~ if it was leaving)( no blinking lights)(extreme speed to cross the sky ), 5 witness's.."we have never seen this king of thing before!" ~js
we were in springhill ks. and the object just faded away into distance   < extra info.
content.summary: Bright light flys across sky

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside to my backyard to have a smoke. i looked up at the sky directly above me and it looked like a giant star was zig-zagging across the sky. it flew in a south east direction towards the moon in a zig zag pattern. when it appeared to be directly in front of the moon it began to descend then abruptly disappeared. the object was far brighter than any star i have ever seen and stood out next to the moon. my father also witnessed the object. this was no comet or meteor. it was no plane or helicopter or balloon. the object moved way to fast and flew way to high to be anything of the sort.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright object that looked like a very large star.

content.detailedDescription: i live about 10 miles from fort drum military base close to edwards,ny.I walked outside on my front porch at 10:30 pm on 6/4/12 and within about 30 seconds i noticed a light appear low in the sky.It was in the opposite direction of the military base.It started moving horizontally across the sky meandering up and down,then after about a minute it disappeared and reappeared at a much higher altitude (straight up)within a second or two.It repeated this process 4-5 times getting higher and higher until it disappeared all together.It was completely quiet,within a few minutes after a jet flew from the base through the area.I have seen many jets,planes,helicopters,and drones and i instantly knew this was different.I pulled out my phone and took a picture (10:31 pm)and in the picture it appears to be 4 sided with a dark center.I did some research and i couldn't find anything i can explain that looks like this.
content.summary: Strange apparently 4 sided light  with a dark center

content.detailedDescription:
Ok.  this is more than a strange coincidence.  you might note i have commented on two other ufo reports.  in regard to tonight, i am ashamed i did not post my sighting sooner.  i must tell you, now, that i saw the same red orb, from new mexico, where i live.  yes, it was in the southern or western sky.  i live seventy miles north of santa fe.  i am looking out beyond the horizon, into the sky, and i see this red star, but is it a plane?  no.  it does not seem to move.  i see a plane to the right flying far above it to the left.  i have no reason for fright, but i feel a chill. its real!  what is it.  it remains still.  it is an intense red object, smaller by far than our moon, but about the size you would expect from a planet.  this is to me, half the size of a dime, in the sky.  it is round, glowing, and stands out clearly.  i have looked at this section of sky continually for three solid years from the same vantage point.  this is an object which has never before appeared.  i do believe there was some movement, that it may have dropped, and it may have made some chnge to the right, but unlike other objects i have seen in my life, this object did not dance, make sudden movements, or fly away rapidly.  it remained.  i admit a fear of it, as i sensed it knew of my presence, and more, that it had called me outside, to see it.  i heard a splash of water, and thought there was a visiting dog, taking a drink from a pan of water, i left outside, earlier in the day, for another, neighbors, dog.  i went outside to greet the dog.  it was not there.  i looked up into the low horizon, and i gasped, to see this deep red glowing orb.  yes, my friend, this is not a coincidence.  i was fortunate to talk with a friend a few hours ago and after.  i went to their place to see if they could see it.  they are a half mile away.  they could not, nor i.  their place is a bit lower on the landscape, than mine.  we are at or about at 7000' above sea level.  it was low on the horizon as you said.  my house is fairly high oa hill, so i saw it on the horizon, a few inches above the horizon.  my friend and i talked about 2012.  could this be nebiru?  it is mentioned by the mayans and is expected, and it's return is marked by a 243 year event, known as the venis transit across the sun, and connected to the last annular eclipse.  the venis transit was june 5th.  i now feel this may not have been a ufo, but a planet, if that is possible.  scientist refuse now, to acknowledge the planet.  lets see who else saw this event.  blessings.  love and light to you.  by the way, i went to hb high school, in 1977.  how's that for synchronicity.  now is the time, the hopis have told us about.  blessings, one and all. the exact time of the sighting may be recorded on twitter, @queerwire.  i wrote, omg, i just saw a ufo....Omfg!
yours in truth.  a reliable witness.
content.summary: A red orb, with the intensity of those red lights you see at an airport, and as large as an aspirin, low to the horizon, stationary, and still for themmost part.

content.detailedDescription:
Star like heading towards a star when the two of them detracted almost like magnets pushing away from each other.  the original moving star-like object made a sharp turn upward then slowly vanished while the other became stationary again continuing to sit as a "normal" star.
this lasted for almost 2 minutes.  the event took place instantly after thinking to myself i should go star gaze
content.summary: Star like traveling for almost 2 minutes after i specifically went outside to sky watch.

content.detailedDescription:
I was dropping the other witness off at her car, and looking at the sky, as i often do.

we both saw something moving, but on a second glance, i noticed it was moving oddly, as described below.

i thought it could have been a plane, but, when it started to move i realized it could not have been one. planes don't move in that way.

i saw three lights (red in color), which moved abnormally: they moved in such a way that it seemed to be three craft (very small), flying in a tight formation. it was coordinated, and they seemed to fly away at a speed similar to an airplane, but it was ascending at too strange of angle to be a plane.

the three objects, at first, appeared to be flat, relative to where i was standing (they appeared to be taking off from san elijo mountain). the one towards the right then moved upward and the craft (or crafts) moved at an 80-something degree angle (where 90 would be straight up), and disappeared into cloud cover. the event was over in 2 or 3 minutes, tops, and besides myself, and another witness, no one else in the area seems to have seen the craft.

i will also add that on the mountain behind california state university, san marcos, there was a shaft of light, which was shining in the sky. if you were across the street from the school, like i was, in the parking lot, and facing that light, the craft would be at 4 o' clock (if the light was 12).  if you were facing the school it would be 3 o'clock, as the school was at an angle ( i was in the parking lot of ralph's, in the middle of the lot.)  the lights faded, and finally disappeared (though it probably just became obscured in cloud cover).  

the lights were non-pulsating, or pulsing; they were simply brightly lit, and continued to stay lit.

i was amazed, and felt inspired after i saw it. i drove relentlessly after i bade goodbye to the other witness, hoping to see it when i got to the top of san elijo. unfortunately, the cloud cover was too great and i could see nothing.  i even stopped the car, and got out, but nothing. radios were working perfectly (actually strangely better than normal, as i usually have issues going up the san elijo hill, coming from cal state san marcos, but i had no static).
content.summary: Saw three small objects (or one large one) in tight, triangle formation, float and ascend into cloud cover

content.detailedDescription:
June 9th 2012 overland park, ks @ 159th & metcalf, 9:23pm cst. looking due east. saw multiple orange / golden objects. traveling north northwest, at altitude i'm guessing @ 10 - 15 thousand feet.  no sound heard, but traveling at high speed.  at first it appeared to be a plane with a flaming engine due to the color, however it left no smoke or contrail.  this object had a gradual arc in its course.  lost visibility when object was blocked by ground structures,  within 3 minutes another object looking exactly the same and following the same course flew by.  this repeated 5 more times within an 8-10 minute time period.  7 objects total. the last two objects flew a slightly shallower course but exhibited the same characteristics.  one of the objects before it was obscured by ground structure seemed to fade out.  the object glowed constant, no flashing lights or tell-tail airplane lighting.  i have multiple videos of it however it does not divulge any further identification.
i was on my parents deck talking with my sister and father after eating dinner.  i had my back to the first object, my father noticed it first.  that is when i turned and saw it.  my father seemed to think it was a helicopter.
content.summary: Multiple orange objects flying across overland park, ks sky.
